name: Ken Attard
what_you_do: Ken Attard specializes as a Mindset Consultant, helping Frustrated Entrepreneurs shift their Mindset to create the results that they desire.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs, Frustrated Entrepreneurs, and Aspiring Entrepreneurs.
social_proof: Ken is the author of the Consumer Educational Guide "How to Step into the Magic of the Successful Entrepreneur Now", co-author of the international Best Selling Book "Making Waves", is regularly featured on Local Television, has been a guest on over 20 international podcasts, and is a dynamic keynote speaker.
signature_programs: "The Mindset Choice - The Choice that Changes Everything" (free online program), Mindset Consulting Sessions, Live Q&A Sessions with Ken Attard, 1-on-1 Sessions with Ken Attard.
business_focus: Helping entrepreneurs and aspiring entrepreneurs elevate their mindset awareness to create the results they desire.
